evidence.claim: Gini provides support for HIPAA compliance to ensure data security in health-related applications.
Integration capabilities with EHR systems using FHIR for data exchange.
Gini specializes in electronic data interchange (EDI) for healthcare transactions.
Gini's platform utilizes HL7 standards for health information interoperability.
The company employs AWS services for its cloud infrastructure to support scalable solutions.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of X12-based use cases or API automation found.
